= Data Directory Setup =

Once the IPT is correctly installed, it is accessible for the following URL: http://localhost:8080/ipt/

To be able to configure the software, the administrator need to select a folder where the IPT will store its configuration.

http://gbif-providertoolkit.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/gbif-ipt-docs/screenshots/GBIF_SETUP.png

To configure the software, the administrator needs to select a folder where IPT will the store configuration. The administrator should supply a specific location for the data directory with an absolute path. Relative paths are not supported.

For example:
Windows: C:\DataDir
Unix: /usr/DataDir
